name: Colorado Gold Rust
blurb: One of the earliest sites in Colorado's Gold Rush history is the confluence of Cherry Creek and the South Platte River, where prospectors first began exploring for gold. On September 20th, Colorado will again make history by hosting the Rocky Mountain region's first Rust conference, nearby that site where precious metals were discovered not so long ago.

name: Rust Belt Rust
blurb: A Rust Conference For Developers Of Any Skill Level

name: Rust.Tokyo
blurb: Rust.Tokyo is an one day conference for Rustaceans with 200+ attendees.
